name: Blueberry Vanilla Gummy Candy
description:
This recipe is a bit of a rehash from a recipe I made a while back. 

WF Blueberry Gummy Candy is a pretty solid jammy blueberry candy note but it lacks a bit in the gummy department. It has a little bit of texture but we're going to add OOO Marshmallow Vanilla to get some texture in there and a nice base note for our vanilla. Good Ol' TFA Vanilla Swirl works really well with creams and fruits and candies and it's kind of exactly what we need in here. 

Sweeten to taste.

Watch the Video Here:

https://youtu.be/JdASYdyLKaY
author: RUG_ly
